article: The New Year is a time of friends, family and fun. People  _  the New Year with many traditions and activities.  _  , not all countries celebrate New Year's Day in the same way. In Japan, people throw beans. They throw beans while  _  ,"Devils out ,good luck/happiness in."After throwing the beans, family members pick up and eat the same number of beans as their age. It will bring  _  and good luck for the New Year. In China, People buy presents, decorations,foods and new clothes a few weeks before the new year. They clean their houses to  sweep away  bad luck. On New Year's Eve people usually get together for a big meal. On New Year's Day, children will  _  hongbao from their parents. People think it will bring good luck to children. People always visit their  _  and friends at this time. The Lion Dance is a  _  activity that is held during the Chinese New Year. People believe that the  _  sound of drums can keep devils away. In India, people usually visit temples to give thanks for a good harvest. Then men and women  _  traditional dances. Family members also enjoy delicious food. They say goodbye to the old year and welcome the New Year.
